sentences.en: a feminist critique of Freud's theories
sentences.cn: 从女权主义的角度对弗洛伊德理论所作的批评

sentences.en: Also, discuss and critique the common methods for controlling translation exposure.
sentences.cn: 此外, 讨论和批判的共同控制方法翻译曝光.

sentences.en: And Adorno's critique inherits the rational tradition in Phenomenology of Spirit.
sentences.cn: 这种洞悉和批判是黑格尔《精神现象学》的理性传统的承继.

sentences.en: He offered to critique our plans.
sentences.cn: 他提出要对我们的计划作评论。

sentences.en: He plays down Mr. Brown's idea in his critique.
sentences.cn: 他在自己的评论中大肆批评布朗先生的想法.

sentences.en: If you have to critique someone, before you do, think of how you would want to be critiqued.
sentences.cn: 所以当你批评什么人之前，想象你自己是否能接受这样的批评。

sentences.en: In his Aesthetics Theory, Adorno expounds systematically his idea of artistic critique.
sentences.cn: 阿多诺在其《美学理论》中比较系统地阐述了他的艺术批判思想.

sentences.en: Kant's work on the critique of experience became ultimately indistinguishable from ontology and metaphysics.
sentences.cn: 康德关于经验的评论著作最终与本体论和形而上学混为一谈。

sentences.en: Marx didn't discuss modernity on the level of rational critique and reconstruction.
sentences.cn: 马克思不是停留在理性批判和理性重建的层面上探讨现代性问题,相反认为,理性原则从属、附于利益原则.

sentences.en: She had brought a book, a feminist critique of Victorian lady novelists.
sentences.cn: 她带来了一本书，一本从女权主义角度对维多利亚时期女小说家进行的评论。

sentences.en: Show them solutions you've come up with and ask a critique.
sentences.cn: 向他们介绍你的解决思路,请他们给予批评指点.

sentences.en: The book provides a thorough critique of current theories.
sentences.cn: 那本书对当今理论予以全面透彻的评论.

sentences.en: The critique of Halsey's actions at Leyte goes to these questions.
sentences.cn: 对莱特湾上哈尔西战斗的批评针对以下这几个问题.

sentences.en: The modern initiation critique is one kind of initiation as a whole.
sentences.cn: 现代启蒙批判总体上就是一种启蒙.

sentences.en: They all joined in a very spirited critique upon the party.
sentences.cn: 她们凑在一起对那伙人发表了一通痛快淋漓的批评.

sentences.en: To those on the inside, the critique will probably seem unreasonable.
sentences.cn: 对内部人士, 批评似乎不合理.

sentences.en: We'll talk more about the requirements of the critique later the semester.
sentences.cn: 我们会在学期晚些时候进一步讨论评论的要求.

sentences.en: Zhang is known more as a critique of the education system.
sentences.cn: 比起老师,更多人知道张鸣是位教育系统的批评家.

words.tran_cn: 鉴定的；[核] 临界的；批评的，爱挑剔的；危险的；决定性的；评论的
精密地；危急地；批评性地；用钻研眼光地
批评家，评论家；爱挑剔的人

trans.tran_cn: 评论文章，评论，批评，批判
trans.tran_en: a detailed explanation of the problems of something such as a set of political ideas
to say how good or bad a book, play, painting, or set of ideas is
to say how good or bad a book, play, painting, or set of ideas is
